languageKey.label: Sharing for page or record
Referenced record maybe a commented page or, if sharing records like news, the shared record.
External prefix for this sharing

The external prefix identifies the TYPO3 table for which the sharing was made. 'pages' in fact means tt_content without associated records from another table. Any other prefix indicated that the comment is associated to this table and, as always, to the content element holding the comment.
Language
Language for which this record is defined.
Shared page
Shared page refers to field reference in the table. It holds the shared pages uid
Share count
Share count is updated automatically when a user calls the page with a sharing component (not with Add This)
Sharer
The sharer is the social network where the page has been shared: Twitter, Facbook, GooglePlus and more
Shared URL

The shared URL is what has been sent to the sharer. Note you losse sharing if you change the URL of your page. Note that such "lost" sharings can always be shown using appropriate URL-info in the plugin
